“Oh thank you Grammy, you’ve always been so nice to me and you can have anything of mine as well I think I can finish up by myself,” said Patricia as she eased her saggy breasts into the cups of the front-hook brassiere, “Alright Patty, shout if you need anything,” replied Edna as she walked away.

After getting her/Edna’s underwear and slip on, Patricia headed back to her grandmother’s former room to look for her toiletries. As she was heading back to the bathroom she tripped and fell, when she got up she noticed that her vision had become blurry, “my contacts must have fallen out, I hope I packed the extra pair,” she moaned. Back in the bathroom she found that she had forgotten her mouthwash and the extra pair of contact lenses.

Looking around she noticed a bottle filled with a bluish liquid and her grandmother’s thick glasses, “I guess this must be Grammy’s mouthwash and I bet I’ll be able to see the craters on the Moon with those glasses,” she muttered with a laugh. Bracing herself for the strong taste of the mouthwash she shut her eyes tight and dumped some in her mouth. Her eyes still shut, she spit out the liquid and out of impulse grasped for Edna’s glasses and slipped them on.

Then…
1253212211111.title: Patricia gains wrinkles and sagging breasts whi...

12532122111111.content:
Opening her eyes once more Patricia felt another shift go through her. The first thing she noticed was how odd her mouth felt and when she placed a hand over it she felt it move in a very telling way, “I have dentures!” she exclaims. After confirming her suspicion –by taking the prosthesis out and putting it back in- Patricia took off her grandmother’s glasses, shut her eyes and tried to massage her temples in an attempt to settle her nerves. However, when she opened her eyes again her vision had become much blurrier than before.

Quickly putting the glasses back, she was mildly surprised that her vision became much sharper, although still unfocused compared to what she was used to. Looking into the mirror she further noted that her irises had become more opaque and somewhat gray, instead of the crystal blue she had always had.

Then she heard her grandmother shout, “PATTY!” Rushing towards the sound of Edna’s scream Patricia became glaringly aware of her extreme changes. Her brassiere strained to contain her breasts as they swung pendulously from her chest, the extra fat on her belly, thighs, hips, derrière and upper arms jiggled and quivered with every step.

Reaching her grandmother, Patricia found her pulling at her front teeth with her hand, “My dentures became REAL TEETH Patty!” shouted Edna.

“And mine became dentures Grammy and my eye sight is gone, I can barely see without your glasses on”

“Oh Patty…” said Edna as she hugged her granddaughter, “I’m so sorry…”

“No, you don’t have to be sorry Grammy, this isn’t your fault. I don’t know what causing all this, but maybe it’s for the better. Even though we haven’t spent much time together lately, you’ve always been there for me Grammy. Unlike my parents –or every other adult for that matter- you’ve never treated me like I was any less just because of my age; you’ve always understood me or at least tried to. I don’t know if this is permanent or not, but if I am to give my youth to anybody, I’d rather it be you.”

“Patty…I…I don’t know what to say,” said Edna as tears welled up in her eyes, “you’re such a wonderful granddaughter…”

“Well, I think I look more like the grandmother now,” said Patricia laughingly, albeit with tears of her own.

Wiping the tears of her face Edna replied, “Yes you do,” smiling, “and if we’re gonna make it to that hair appointment you better finish getting dressed. After all, a lady of your *many* years can’t leave the house in only her girdle, brassiere and slip,” wagging her finger in mock admonishment.

“Oh, of course not, what kind of example would I be to my *young* and *impressionable* granddaughter?” joked Patricia, eliciting laughter from both of them.

Patricia was in her grandma's room looking at herself in the mirror to see how things had changed. When suddenly she felt an itch in her privates. She was wearing a skirt so she couldn't scratch it directly so she sat on the bed and hiked up her skirt to her waist. Underneath she was wearing control top pantyhose and a plain white cotton full-cut panty. She took one of her hands to scratch herself. When she did it felt 'Wonderful'.

A short while later, Edna came into the room looking for her. She found Patricia still lying there, her hand in her crotch. "Patricia, what are you doing?" she asked.

"It feels so good!" was all that Patricia said. Edna talked to her for a while, but Patricia wouldn't stop.

Some time later, men were in the bedroom with her. Ma'am," one of the ambulance technicians said, "how are you feeling?"

"I am feeling great! It feels so so good!" she said.

"I can see that. But can you stop and talk to me?"

"I don't want to."

"Can I ask you a few questions?" Then before waiting for an answer, "What is you name?"

"My name is Patricia."

"How old are you?"

"I'm nineteen."

"Where do you live?" Patricia gave her address.

"Do you live alone?"

"No, I live with my mother." The tech wrote everything she said down, Patricia didn't stop rubbing herself throughout the questioning. In the mean time the other technician took Patricia's blood pressure and her pulse and the other vital signs. When they were done, they came to speak to Edna.

"I heard what she said," Edna informed them. "Her real name is Edna Fellows and she is 85 years old. She must think she is me."

"I guess so. Clearly something is wrong. We should take her to the hospital."

"OK."

"Do you stay here with her?"

"No I'm visiting my grandmother a few days. I live with my mother."

"Well you should come with us to the hospital. You can call your mother from there."

12533222221.content:
Twelve-year-old Bailey Norton always felt her five-year-old sister Chloe was so lucky. She just got to be an adorable little kid. Bailey missed those days. One day, Bailey finally got a chance to see what it would be like to be the younger sister. On May 3, 2018, Bailey awoke in Chloe's old crib, and she was now wearing a diaper.

         Using the bars of the crib to pull herself to her feet, Bailey noticed she was now in her sister's room, only it looked as it had years ago - back when Chloe still wore diapers. It was covered with pink - the walls, the floor, everything. There was a changing table in the corner, and the place was covered with baby toys. She knew immediately this was Chloe's room and not hers made to look like a nursery - Chloe's room had always been smaller than hers.

         On the far side of the room, Bailey could see herself in the mirror. What does she see?
12533222221.title: Crib and Diapers

125332222211.content:
Bailey was stunned by the sight that met her eyes. She was just a little girl, no older than two. She wore pink feetie pajamas with a noticeable bulge below her waist that told her she now wore a diaper. Her brownish-blond hair was now in pigtails, and her diaper had now clearly been used. She was soaked.

         Bailey felt herself start to cry. She had wanted to be a little girl again, but this was not what she had in mind. She did not want to be a baby again. At this age, she couldn't do anything, even use the bathroom. She didn't fancy having to go through potty training all over again, but she definitely didn't want to return to using diapers.

         As she was considering what to do next, she saw Chloe step into the room. She looked exactly the same as before - a five-year-old girl who had just worn her last Pull-Up quite recently. She was now apparently her big sister.

         Upon seeing baby Bailey trying to stand in her crib, Chloe yelled, "Mommy! The baby's awake, and I think she needs to be changed!"

         Instantly, her mother Shannon came walking into the room.

         "Well, hello, little one," she said, as she lifted Bailey out of the crib.

         Noticing the girl was wet, she said, "Oh, I think you're right, Chloe. We'd better get her changed first."

         Shannon placed her daughter on the changing table and removed her diaper. Suddenly, Bailey had to face the indignity of having her first diaper change in years, while her little sister who was still in kindergarten watched. It was humiliating.

         What now?

1253322222222222111.content:
When Jack came downstairs on the day of prom, he received a strange sensation. For one thing, his prom date Olive now seemed to tower over him, when normally she was about a foot shorter. But the most confusing thing was when Olive got all flustered, muttered something about this not being the right house, and ran outside.

         Bewildered, Jack tried to call after her and froze. The minute he said her name, he knew something was up. His voice was higher than he remembered, and not like a girl's voice. It sounded like a little boy's. It was a voice he hadn't heard since he was in grade school.

         Quickly, Jack ran to a nearby mirror, and his worst fears were confirmed. Instead of a sixteen-year-old sophomore, an eight-year-old second grader was now looking back at him. His blue suit had been replaced with an red Avengers T-shirt and a pair of bright blue shorts. The crinkling sound as he moved around reminded him of something he had forgotten: when he was little, he occasionally had to wear Pull-Ups when he left the house, due to accidents. It had stopped around third grade, but clearly in second grade he had still needed them.

         His auburn was now buzz-cut, as it had been when he was eight; he didn't start growing it out until he was twelve. Below that, he wore a pair of light-up Buzz Lightyear sandals. He was now half his age, and he looked it.

         What does Jack do next?

choices: He cries and runs to Mommy.
He decides to accept this and runs up to his room.
1253322222222222112.content:
When Jack came downstairs on the day of prom, he received a strange sensation. For one thing, his prom date Olive Cross now seemed to tower over him. But the most confusing thing was when Olive got all flustered, muttered something about this not being the right house, and ran outside.

         Bewildered, Jack tried to call after her and froze. The minute he said her name, he knew something was up. His voice was more high-pitched than he was used to, and he thought he detected a slight lisp he hadn't had since first grade.

         Quickly, Jack ran to a nearby mirror, and his worst fears were confirmed. Staring back at him through the mirror was a young boy who looked like he might be too young even for kindergarten, let alone high school. He now wore a smaller version of the dark violet suit he was wearing before, but when he looked down his pants he could see that he now wore a disposable diaper. He had had problems with daytime accidents until he was six.

         Her auburn hair was now buzz-cut, as it had been when he was five. Below, he wore a pair of light-up Buzz Lightyear sneakers. He looked exactly as he did the summer before he started kindergarten.

         "Crap," he muttered, which sounded wrong coming from a kindergartener. "I look like I'm about five years old."

         What does Jack do now?

choices: She is shocked to see her son as a five-year-old.
She asks what's wrong, believing his current age to be normal.
12533222222222221121.content:
Unsure what else to do, Jack ran upstairs to find his mother Viviana, thinking she might know what to do. Maybe there was a doctor out there who could fix them. Despite these hopeful thoughts in his mind, he couldn't seem to stop himself from crying like a baby.

         When he finally finds Viviana in her room, how does she react?
12533222222222221121.title: He cries and runs to Mommy.

choices: He plays with Nick and Sophie, discovering they're now best friends.
Hungry, he runs to find his mommy, asking for food.
12533222222222221122.content:
Jack sighed. Oh, well. What was he to do? He had been nervous about graduating in a few years. Now he wouldn't have to worry about that for a long time. It might be nice to be a little kid again. It wasn't like he was missing much from high school - he was kind of a loner. This actually would have been his and Olive's first date.

         There were advantages to being little again. For one thing, there was the fact that he could run around and play all day, with no responsibilities. Also, his seven-year-old brother Nick and three-year-old sister Sophie had always been so much younger than him, so they had never been close. With his being five now, he might be able to see what it would be like to grow up with siblings.

         Feeling like he had just found a blessing in disguise, Jack ran upstairs, giggling. When he entered his room, he saw a room fit for a five-year-old. The walls were painted blue with clouds. There were posters from the latest Disney movies, and toys covered the ground. Not to mention, he saw a pack of spare diapers in the corner. His room looked exactly as it had eleven years ago.

         What does he do now?
12533222222222221122.title: He decides to accept this and runs up to his room.

12533222222222221221222111.content:
Her room had completely changed. It still looked like a child's room, but not a baby's, nor did it look as "girly." The walls were now painted green and were adorned with posters from Harry Potter and Percy Jackson. Her bed now didn't look any different than it did when she was sixteen. She took that to mean that she'd aged quite a bit. Based on the way her room looked, she was starting to hope that she wa sixteen.

         However, the minute she got out of bed, she knew that was not the case. For one thing, she was barely five feet, which meant she had shrunk at least six inches. Secondly, as she glanced down at her bare feet, she knew that those were still the feet of a little girl. The cincher came when she walked over to her vanity and saw her reflection.

         By her estimation, she was eleven years old, meaning she had aged nine years but was still five years younger than she had been originally. Her blond hair was tied in pigtails, and she still had braces on her teeth. She was wearing sea-green kids' jammies, Percy Jackson-themed, and still looked less like the teenager she had been and more like a little girl.

         Well, at least I'm potty-trained now, she thought, looking on the bright side. But now I'm back in that private hell they call middle school.

         What now?

125332222222222212212221111.content:
Somehow Angela knew her parents were behind this, even while they played dumb. They were always so nervous about her growing up, and now she had become a little girl again. Coincidence? She didn't think so.

         However, she didn't know exactly how question them about it, so she had no choice but to get ready for a return to sixth grade. She got out of her jammies and dressed in a light green Avengers T-shirt and a pair of long blue pants. She pulled on a pair of socks and shoes, then headed out the door.

         How does she get to school?
125332222222222212212221111.title: Angela gets dressed and returns to sixth grade.

choices: Yes, from having babysat a few of them

12533222222222221221222112.content:
Unfortunately, it was not much. Her room was still that of a toddler's -- the only change being she now laid in a toddler's bed with pink bedsheets and a Frozen bedspread. She had only gotten a year older and was now three years older. And when she glanced down, she was disappointed to realize that she was still wearing a diaper. She apparently was not ready for training pants at this age.

         Then it got worse. Upon further inspection, she realized that not only was she wearing a diaper, but she had used it. It was wet. Well, this was a load of crap. What was the point of getting older again? She was still pretty much a baby. She wanted to be a big girl again.

         What does she do?

She hopped to her feet, noticing as she did so that the only thing she wore other than her diaper was a light blue Sesame Street T-shirt. She looked so annoyingly adorable. She just wanted her regular life back. She ran into the hall and headed for the stairs.

         What happens now?

This was finally too much for Angela. Her eyes watered up, and she could feel tears pouring down her face as she cried more than she remembered doing in a long time. She beat her little fists against the baby gate and dropped to ground, kicking her legs and pounding her fists against the floor. She knew she was throwing a temper tantrum, but she just couldn't take this anymore. Besides, she was a three-year-old now -- this was perfectly age-appropriate now.

         What now?

Suddenly, Angela heard a familiar voice call out from downstairs. "I'm home!" However, as Angela continued her tantrum, she heard rapid footsteps approaching. Angela stopped her tantrum to look up; there stood Angela's five-year-old sister Sadie. Sadie was wearing a sky blue dress which was still covered with her jacket and backpack with her light brown hair hanging loose behind her. Sadie opened the gate with only a little difficulty. Seeing her baby sister so big just made Angela cry harder. Sadie kneeled to Angela's level.

"What's wrong Angie?" Saide asked as she began to examine her new little sister. "Are you wet?" Sadie questioned only making Angela cry more. "Oh," Sadie replied, "I know what to do!"

125332222222222212212221121122221.content:
As Angela cried, she heard the pitter-patter of little footsteps as her three-year-old sister Sadie walked over. Sadie had brown hair tied in pigtails and currently she was wearing nothing but a flowery purple pull-up. She looked so cute and childlike, but she seemed mature compared to little Angela. It was such a horrible experience, being smaller than a girl who still wore pull-ups, particularly since Angela was lying here in a poopy diaper.

         "Mommy!" Sadie cried. "The baby needs her diaper changed."

         Instantly, the girls' mommy walked over and lifted Angela into her arms. "Oh, Angie," she said. "How did you get over here? Was your big sister playing with you?"

         "No," said Sadie defensively. "I just found her here."

         "Nonsense, Sadie," said their mommy. "Little Angie is too young to get all the way here without help. She can't even crawl yet."

         Then Angela was carried back into her nursery and placed on a changing table, where her mommy removed her diaper and wiped her butt.

         "Eew," said Sadie. "The baby's stinky."

         "Yes, she is," said their mommy, as she powdered Angela's bottom and placed a new diaper on her. "But it wasn't too long ago when I was changing your diapers, Sadie."

         "But not anymore," said Sadie. "'Cause I'm a big girl."

         "Really?" said their mommy, as she lifted Angela into her arms. "Because big girls don't run around in just a pull-up. Where are your clothes?"

         Sadie had no reply, so their mommy laid Angela back on the changing table and opened one of the drawers, since apparently the girls now shared this room, then she placed a light blue dress onto Sadie.

         "There we go," she said. "Now let's get you girls downstairs for breakfast."

         Angela was lifted into her mommy's arms again as she carried her out of the room. Sadie skipped ahead of them as headed down into the kitchen. Once in the kitchen, Sadie got into her booster seat and their mommy poured her a bowl of cereal, which she ate rather messily, per usual. Angela was used to this, but she was not used to watching this from a baby's perspective.

         Then she was held to her mommy's chest and breast-fed for the first time in years. She surprised to realize that breast milk didn't taste that bad, but it was still a really weird experience that she would like to end.

         Angela stared in shock from her car seat. That was not at all what she imagined her sister might say. Nancy remembered the old reality -- and she didn't care. Well, of course she didn't care. She was an eleven-year-old girl who had just become an adult who was in charge of her mother and big sister. It would only be later that Nancy would realize how much being an adult sucked. Right now, she was still too much of a child to see that.

She almost didn't want to grow up again -- that would be better than having to repeat her life.

1253322222222222122122211212121.content:
Throughout that day, Angela tried desperately to go back to sleep as that seemed to be the only time she would age up so to speak. All day in preschool she just laid down in a corner, ironically the only time throughout the day Angela outright refused to go to sleep was nap time as her pride wouldn't allow any preschool teacher what to do. Angela did not go home that day without her mother being pulled to the side for a word with the teacher. This is why Angela got a ten minute time out when she got home after which she went back to her room and wrapped herself in her sheets.

However, Angela had no success getting to sleep, and no one bothered to visit her until after her mom left leaving Nancy in charge. “Don’t worry Mom,” Angela heard the tween tell her mother, “I’ll get little ms. Cranky Panties out of her mood, now have a nice meeting see you later tonight.”

About five minutes after hearing a car pull away Angela heard a knock at her door. “Can I come in?” Not a minute later the door opened not that Angela saw anything as she was still wrapped in the Frozen bedsheets and staring determinedly at the wall. “You didn't say no Angie,” Nancy pointed out as she sat on the bed, “anything you want to talk about?”

“No!” Angela declared.

“You have a bad day at Preschool?”

“No!”

“Did someone upset you?”

“No!”

“Are you mad at me?”

“No!”

“Do you know how to say anything other than no?” Nancy asked.

“No!”

Nancy sighed, “aren’t you hot under there?”

The truth was Angela was boiling under the sheets, but she didn't want Nancy to know that. “And aren’t you hungry? Mom said you didn't eat anything at preschool today.”

“I no hungry!” Angela remarked slightly embarrassed by her toddler speech; however, at that moment, her stomach gave an audible grumble.

Nancy got up from the bed, and Angela thought she had won the battle until she smelled something coming up from downstairs. It smelled like cheese, and perhaps it was her hunger talking, but Angela thought it was the most delicious smell in the world, she wanted to get up and get some of the food, but she wanted to get to sleep and see if her age changed.
1253322222222222122122211212121.title: Ms. Cranky Panties

12533222222222221221222112121212.content: Ultimately, Angela opted to stay in bed. Shortly after, she fell asleep. When she wakes up next, has her age changed?

Currently, she was barefoot and wearing light green Little Mermaid pajamas. She was only four feet, seven inches, but to Angela's horror, she now towered over her -- she was that small.

12533222222222221221222112221.content:
Jasmine entered the room and shouted, “I’ve got her mom,” with a sigh before putting on a kindly smile and walking to your bedside where she immediately knelt to your level. “You wanna talk about it?” Jasmine questioned. Crying was your only response. With a smile, Jasmine reached under the bed and pulled up a stuffed cat.

“What’s going on Jasmine?” your sister asked in a voice different from her own, “I was having a purrrfect dream.”

“I don’t know Ms. Whiskers,” Jasmine answered, “something made Angie start to cry.”

“Purrrhaps she needs her diapurrr changed,” responded Ms. Whiskers.

“Now Ms. Whiskers,” Jasmine went on, “I know you’re cranky from being woken up, but you know Angie only wears diapers at night and she’s getting better all the time in her potty training.”

For some reason the knowledge that you apparently were improving in potty training made you stop crying a little as your wails became more silent sobs.

“You see?” Jasmine asked, “she’s getting better already.”

“Then I’m going to go back for a cat nap,” said Ms. Whiskers. Jasmine returned the stuffed animal to her usual spot before turning to you.

“How about a hug?” Jasmine offered. For some reason, a hug sounded good as you uncovered yourself from the blankets and crawl into Jasmine’s awaiting arms.

“There we go,” Jasmine commented as she slowly picked you up after placing a hand on your diapered bottom. “Oh, I see,” Jasmine spoke in an understanding voice, she began to walk over to the changing table.

“No!” You said forcefully.

“No?” Jasmine questioned.

“No,” you repeated.

“You’ll get a rash,” Jasmine pointed out, “you had one last month remember? Mom had to put those oven mitts on your hands to keep you from scratching?”

“No change, me no baby,” You say crossing your arms.

Jasmine sighed, “such a stubborn little girl,” she whispered, “alright,”
Your sister carried you across the room, “oh boy, you’re getting heavy,” she commented. Jasmine sat down in a rocking chair next to a small bookshelf and placed you in her lap. “This is always nice,” Jasmine commented more to herself than you as she began simultaneously to rock back and forth and rub your back. You started to flutter your eyes as you found yourself laying against your sister's chest, by now you’d stopped crying altogether with a final hiccup. You were struggling to stay awake as you wondered how long you’d been sitting like this but quickly thought it didn't matter. Suddenly, you felt pressure in your lower body…
12533222222222221221222112221.title: Jasmine

125332222222222212212221122211.content:
You could feel the pressure building and knew if you didn’t act quickly you would suffer the indignity of having your poopy but wiped clean by your formerly little sister. First you try to get out of Jasmine’s grasp, but even with all the strength you could muster you were only able to wiggle pathetically in your sister’s grasp indeed it seemed Jasmine hadn’t noticed you were trying to escape, she sat with her eyes closed as she continued to rock and hum to you. Suddenly, you get a childish impulse too strong to control; you grab Jasmine’s left pigtail and pull as hard as you can.

“Ow!” Jasmine cried out opening her eyes and looking at you crossly, “Angie, you know better.”

“Potty,” you say.

“Yeah,” Jasmine responds, “you went potty, that’s why you’re wet, and yet you won’t let me change you.”

You point to the door, “potty.”

“Oh,” Jasmine understood as she got to her feet, “you mean you have to go potty right now.” Jasmine carried you right out of your room and down the hall. There were a couple of changes to the bathroom; gone was your expensive make-up and hair care products replaced by shampoo featuring Sofia the First and toothpaste with Dora the Explorer additionally there was now a small step-stool by the sink and a training toilet seat for a toddler. Jasmine helped you take off your pajamas and diaper before placing you on the toilet. “I’ll give you your privacy Sweetie,” Jasmine told you, “call me when you’re ready to be wiped.”

It seems Angie got you on the toilet right on time; your bowels seemed to be very eager to empty so much so not a second after Jasmine left you did you hear several quick splashes. Once finished you attempted to reach for the toilet paper, but it was too far. “Help,” you desperately call.

Jasmine ran in and quickly took a wad of toilet paper before going to work, “what a big girl,” she complimented. After Jasmine had you cleaned up, she flushed the toilet and helped you to the sink. “Remember,” Jasmine noted as she helped you wash your hands, “sing the alphabet song I’ve been teaching you to know how long to keep your hands under the water.”

For some reason, you try to do just that but find yourself getting stuck several times before Jasmine smiled and turned off the water. “And since you were such a good girl for telling me you had to go potty, you get to sleep with me tonight, and tomorrow we’ll hang out all day,” Jasmine promised as she helped you back into your pajamas and a fresh diaper and without another word she carried you back to her room. The two of you got comfortable in her bed, and soon you were both asleep.

12533222222222222222212222211.content:
My name is Skye, and I am thirteen years old . . . or at least I was. I'm not going to say that I didn't sometimes miss being younger, that time when all you had to worry about was playtime -- everything else came second. But I never wanted this....

         It was an ordinary Saturday. I had opted to babysit my neighbors' little girls. I didn't know much about them, but Marcy was nine and Annie was six. They seemed so happy and carefree, it made me feel a little nostalgic. I don't know if they sensed that or what, but they convinced me to play like I was one of them -- a little kid. I didn't see what it could so I consented. It was while jumping on the trampoline with the girls that I began to feel different. The world suddenly seemed a lot bigger, but the clincher was when I looked up and saw Marcy and Anna kneeling at my side -- and they looked so much bigger than me.

         "It worked," Annie breathed with amazement.

         "I told you it would," came Marcy's smug retort. "Look at her. Isn't she adorable?"

         "She looks like a baby," said Anna.

         "She is," said Marcy. "Look -- she even wears diapers."

         It was with a dawning realization that it occurred to me that they were talking about me. The same second that thought hit, I felt another strange sensation -- a warm feeling was spreading around my crotch, and I realized that I was peeing myself. And the girls were right -- I was now wearing a diaper. I was a baby, not even two years old. Horrified and fearful, I found myself start to cry, only it wasn't the sob I was used to -- it was the wail of an infant.

         "Uh-oh," said Annie. "I think she needs her diaper changed."

         "Yeah," said Marcy. "I didn't think that through. I've never changed a diaper before."

         "Then what do we do?" asked Annie. "Can we turn her back?"

         "I don't know how," said Marcy. "I don't even know how this worked."

         All I could do was cry, for I no longer had the communication skills to translate my displeasure any other way. This wasn't fair. I didn't want to be a baby again. And I definitely didn't like sitting in my own urine.

         What was I to do?
12533222222222222222212222211.title: The girls are 9 and 6; their babysitter is 13.

         For one thing, he found himself in a nursery, one equipped with toys, a changing table, and stacks of diapers. But that wasn't the worst of it. The worst of it was how big everything looked. In fact, he discovered that he was lying in a baby's crib. He was now small enough to fit comfortably in a crib. Worried, he glanced downward and saw his worst fears confirmed - he was now wearing a disposable baby diaper, and it had been used. He found himself completely soaked and sitting in his own waste.

         Somehow he had turned into a baby. Rather than celebrating his eighteenth birthday, he would now be celebrating his first. Clearly upset with this situation, Frank saw no other option but to bawl his little eyes, acting like the baby he now was. Instantly, his cries alerted the attention of his mother.

         Cooing him softly, his mother lifted him out of his crib. "Oh, does someone need a diaper change?"

         She placed him on the changing table, and as his dirty diaper is removed, what does Frank discover?

         "He's all right," said Isabela, lifting him in her arms. "He just had his diaper changed. He's excited to be turning one."

         The adult Frank chuckled. "I'll bet."

1253322222222222222221222222222222222222.content:
Emma stunned at the sight of her parents Matthew and Abby. She didn't know what happened, but they were both eight years old. Matthew's dark hair had lightened to blond and was cut in a childish buzz-cut. He wore a long-sleeved striped shirt and a pair of shorts. Abby, likewise, was blond now, but her hair was long and tied into pigtails. She wore a sleeveless pink shirt and a pair of jeans. Both children were barefoot, and they looked miserable.

         "What's the matter, guys?" Emma said. "You're kids again. Isn't that what everyone wants?"

         "It's not as great as it sounds," said Abby, blushing slightly at how childish her voice now sounded. "Sure, we can play all day, but we no longer have any control over our lives." She glared at her husband. "This is all your fault. Why did you have to talk me into this?"

         "Don't blame me," said Matthew. "You agreed..."

         Emma cut in, interrupting her parents' argument which was starting to sound like siblings' bickering. "Well, I'm sorry, guys," she said. "But you should have thought about that before. Now, since you're now both eight, I'd say it's way past your bedtime. Why don't you tuck in? I'm enrolling you in second grade tomorrow."

         Abby sighed as she and Matthew stood up. "Thank you for making me feel even worse, Emma."

         "You can continue to address me by my first name," said Emma, "but I think it's time that you start thinking of me as your mommy. I'm afraid, you see, that the tables have turned."

         Then Emma tucked her former parents into bed. What now?

He wore a black T-shirt and a pair of shorts the same color. Abby, on the other hand, looked to be about nine. Her hair had lightened to blond and was tied into pigtails. She wore a sleeveless pink shirt and a pair of jeans. Both children were barefoot, and they looked miserable.

         "What's the matter, guys?" Emma said. "You're kids again. Isn't that what everyone wants?"

         "It's not as great as it sounds," said Abby, blushing slightly at how childish her voice now sounded.

         "Well, speak for yourself," said Matthew. "I'm kind of looking forward to experiencing high school again -- best four years of my life."

         "Yeah, I'd kill to be a teen," said Abby. "But I'm stuck as a little girl.

         "And I'm afraid you're going to have to stay that way," said Emma. "I don't know how to turn you back. And Dad, I'm afraid high school is too premature. You're still in middle school, kiddo."

         Abby giggled as Matthew paled. "Not so funny anymore, is it? At least I don't have to go to middle school. Thanks, Emma, for putting that in perspective. I'm almost looking for to returning to third grade."

         "You can continue to address me by my first name," said Emma, "but I think it's time that you start thinking of me as your mommy. And also... it's a school night, so time for bed."

         Then Emma tucked her former parents into bed. What now?

Matthew looked to be about five years old; his dark hair had lightened to blond and was cut in a childish buzz-cut. He wore a long-sleeved striped shirt and a pair of shorts. In his arms was a small baby girl in a colorful onesie. The baby was sucking on her toes, and Emma could tell this used to be her mother.

         "Stop it, Emma," said Matthew with a noticeable lisp. "I don't know how t'is happened. I wanna be a grown-up again. I really don't wanna return to kindergarten, and I'm betting your mother is hating being back in diapers . . . even though she's in no position to say so."

It all started the week after Andy's 13th birthday. He asked for a bunch of cool new video games and I spent the weekend at his house playing video games. My name is Jake and and I'm 13 years old, just like Andy. We both play soccer and we're both computer geeks and video game nerds in school. Neither of us are very big or strong or athletic, we're just very average. We're exactly the same height, at 5 ft 4 inches and about 150 pounds. We're skinny and short and we really don't stand out in school or on the soccer field.

The only difference between us is the fact that I have blond hair and Andy has jet black hair.

When Andy woke up the following morning, I was already playing HALO on his Xbox. He stumbled into the bathroom to brush his teeth, wearing only his shorts. When he came out and stood next to where I was sitting on the carpeted floor in his bedroom, I already noticed something weird about him.

His abs seemed a little more defined compared to the previous night, and his pectorals appeared a little bigger. Had he become more muscular overnight?

I ignored it and waited for him to sit down. As he plopped down next to me and grabbed the game controller, I also noticed that his biceps bulged a little. What was going on?

1452.content:
https://www.writing.com/main/interact/it...

Maybe girlfriend isn't the right thing to say. You see, in reality we were just really close friends. We went on a few dates but decided that we were better off staying close friends. All our friends call us the twins because of how long we've been friends and because of how close our birthdays are to each other. In fact, over the years some teachers have just assumed that we were dating. But neither of us could have predicted what happened on that one summer night.

My family was getting ready to go and have a barbecue at my friend Hanna's house when my mom answered the home phone. She seemed to be talking for a while so my dad and I decided to watch some tv in the living room while we waited. "Who do you think that is Kyle?" My dad asked.

"Beats me" I replied.

The two of us continued watching the tv until my mom called dad into the kitchen. The two of them talked for a bit, but I couldn't here what it was about. Eventually, thought, we did leave. But the walk there seemed awkwardness around. Once we arrived my parents went inside to chat with Hanna's parents while I went to the backyard to talk with Hanna. When I walked through the gate I just stood in awe as I looked at my friend. She really was beautiful, with light brown hair that went down to her upper back and the fact that she stayed in perfect shape by playing soccer (a sport I also played). The two of us joked around as Hanna tended to the grill, and just had a good time overall. All of our parents came outside shortly before the meat was ready to come off the grill. As the six of us ate, Hanna and I could feel that something was on our parents minds. Eventually, we spoke up and demanded to know what was bugging them. We could tell they didn't want to, but they said we were almost adults and have the freedom to know. They told us that in one week the public would have access to these places called Body Swap Clinics. And along with the opening of these clinics, a list of all the people used as test subjects over the last 20 years would be released. And apparently, Hanna and I were near the top of that list. Apparently, shortly after the two of us were born both of our parents were approached by some scientists offering to pay them a large sum of money to test an experimental body swap machine. The four of them were hesitant at first, but eventually decided to go for it. One month later, and the swap went off perfectly and our parents were both paid $100,000, which they put in a college account for each of us. They went on to tell us that we would have a week to decide if we want to live the rest of our lives in the bodies we were born in and fill out the forms to get the one time free swap.

"We don't expect you to make a decision now" my mom said. "But it is something that the two of you should think about"

Hanna and I sat there dumbfounded at what we were just told. Not only was body swapping a real thing, but Hanna and I were some of the first people it was tested on. "Would, would I have to live as Hanna the rest of my life?" I asked.

"That's entirely up to the both of you" Hanna's mom replied. "Because this is a government run group they have the ability to adjust all your documents so that you can stay with your current families"

"Well, I guess we have some thinking to do" Hanna said. I nodded my head in agreement, but couldn't say anything. I just couldn't believe that for the last 17 years, I've been living in the wrong body. That I was really supposed to be my best friend and she was supposed to be me.

After dinner, Hanna and I went upstairs to her room while our parents remained outside as they tried to enjoy the rest of their night. "So, what do you think we should do" I asked.

"Well, don't hate me but..." Hanna started before trailing off. "I, I kinda wanna do the swap"

"What!? I, I mean, why?"

"Well, just think about it. Our friends joke that we're really siblings because of how similar we are. And nobody said this had to be permanent. We could just try it out and if we don't feel comfortable we'll just swap back"

"I guess you have a good point there"

While we had pretty much decided that we would at least see what our lives were supposed to be like, we did take a few more days to think it over before telling our parents our choice. Then the fateful day came and the list of everyone who had been swapped was released. Sure enough, the names Kyle Johnson and Hanna Brown were near the top. We proceeded to go to the clinic to file our paperwork to swap back and be given a day when we would wake up in the others body.

We had about a week to teach each other everything we would need to live in our rightful bodies. And before we knew it, the day had come for us to go through with the swap. Our parents had drove us, and we met up in the parking lot before going inside. As we signed the last of the paperwork, the head of the clinic came and introduced himself. While talking to him Hanna mentioned how we were just going to try this out and see how comfortable we are in the others body. He went on to tell us that due to the nature of the early tests, the test subjects bodies could only safely sustain one more swap. To try any more would run the risk of killing one or both subjects. He told us he understands if we wanted to back out knowing this. Hanna and I gave each other a look as we thought about it, and eventually decided to go through with the swap. We had both grown increasingly curious over the course of the past few days. We were then taken to the room where the swap would be preformed. They laid us down on a pair of tables and attached a helmet to each of our heads. The next thing either of us remembers was receiving a shot and being told to count backwards from 100.

As the effects of the drugs began wearing off and I came to, I could only hear the sound of a clock ticking. I trying to open my eyes but they still felt heavy. I groaned and rolled my head to the side, feeling long hair tickle the back of my neck. Then I heard a woman's voice as she pushed a button and told someone I was waking up, followed by the sound of her high heeled shoes clicking on the floor as she walked towards me. "Careful sweetie" she said. "The drugs shouldn't fully wear off for an hour or so". Hearing that, all I could do was groan again and give up on holding my head up. And before I knew it I was asleep again.

When I woke up again I was able to open my eyes completely. I could still hear the clock ticking away in the background, but that was it. No other noises. Once she was done she took me out to the lobby where I rejoined both my parents and Hanna's parents where they handed me Hanna's jean jacket. info.brief_description: The interactive story where you don't have to show the cause of transformation trouble.
info.description:
Welcome to the interactive "Things Change for No Reason", where the cause of things like gender bending, body switching, or age regression is not required. Here are some terms and conditions before the fun begins:

1. Don't put down a cause for someone's transformation; I don't want to be made a liar from the title. So no ray guns, pandemics, witches, or any of that stuff. However, things like wishes are acceptable since they technically lack physical presence to really be considered "causes." Just don't overdo them.

2. No exceeding the rating or putting in offensive material.

3. Show some respect for grammar and story structure.

4. Don't waste space for choices. For example, in "Body Swap", don't just waste the space on one story; give multiple choices. Be sure to use "other" or "something else" choices to give others the chance to give out their ideas.
